text: Ilaria Latini (Rome,1972) is an Italian voice actress. Daughter of voice actor Franco Latini, she is the voice of Asuka Soryu Langley in the original Italian dub of Neon Genesis Evangelion. ==Filmography== ===Animated Roles=== * Animaniacs - Dot Warner * Avatar: The Last Airbender - Katara * Baby Looney Tunes - Baby Tweety * Boogiepop Phantom - Misuzu * Brandy & Mr. Whiskers - Brandy Harrington * Digimon Adventure - Kari Kamiya * Digimon Adventure 02 - Kari Kamiya * Fillmore! - Ingrid Third * FLCL - Kitsurubami * Gunbuster 2 - Nono * His and Her Circumstances - Aya Sawada * Neon Genesis Evangelion - Asuka Langley Sohryu * Pinky, Elmyra & the Brain - Elmyra * Rugrats - Lillian "Lil" DeVille * Sonic X - Cream the Rabbit * South Park - Ike Broflovski * The Vision of Escaflowne - Hitomi Kanzaki * Video Girl Al - Ai Amano * Winx Club - Flora ===Film Roles=== * Cloverfield - Marlena Diamond * Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion - Asuka Langley Sohryu * Revolutionary Girl Utena: The Movie - Anthy Himemiya * Rugrats in Paris: The Movie - Lillian "Lil" Deville * Sailor Moon R: The Movie - Sailor Venus / Minako Aino * Shrek the Third - Cinderella Category:1972 births Category:Actors from Rome Category:Italian voice actors
title: Ilaria Latini
